definition: to drag/to tow/to trail/to hang down/to mop (the floor)/to delay/to drag on
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

sentences.english: The drag and drop feature allows you to drag an appointment, for example, to a new time.
sentences.chinese: 拖放功能允許您將一個約會拖動到一個新的時間。

sentences.english: Users can then drag and drop documents into this folder.
sentences.chinese: 用戶然後可以拖放文檔到這個文件夾中。

sentences.english: See the container microformat to see how a drop target is represented and how the drag-and-drop operation can be performed.
sentences.chinese: 查看容器微格式，以弄清拖放操作是怎樣執行的。

sentences.english: Elements can be created using drag-and-drop gestures from the drawing palette.
sentences.chinese: 元素可以使用繪圖板的拖放功能創建。

sentences.english: The player would need to drag and drop the instrument to its orchestra family area.
sentences.chinese: 該播放器將需要拖放工具的樂團家庭領域。

sentences.english: These two functions enable all of the drag-and-drop functionality in the application.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個函數在應用程序中啓用所有拖放功能。

sentences.english: Drop tail hem with split side seams.
sentences.chinese: 拖放與尾部拆方接縫下襬。

sentences.english: You can add additional hints and drag sources dynamically to the form using JavaScript.
sentences.chinese: 您可以添加額外的線索，並動態地拖放源。

sentences.english: Drag-and-drop, escrow and multiple recipient functions are supported.
sentences.chinese: 拖放，等待條件完成的契據和倍數收件人功能被支持。

sentences.english: Re-order rows by numerical weight instead of dragging.
sentences.chinese: 不用拖放操作，而用數字權重方式重新對行排序。

sentences.english: Drag and drop the fireworks boat, 100 boats in the ball in the crossed flags.
sentences.chinese: 快艇拖放着焰火，百艘旗船在綵球中穿行。

sentences.english: Any scrollable drag-and-drop target must auto-scroll.
sentences.chinese: 任何可滾動的拖放目標對象都必須支持自動滾屏。

sentences.english: The details window automatically opens when the first source operator is dropped.
sentences.chinese: 當拖放第一個源操作符時，會自動打開細節窗口。

sentences.english: This is the only place on the page into which we can drag components.
sentences.chinese: 這是該頁面上我們可以把組件拖放進去的惟一區域。

sentences.english: You can drag and drop any of the items already placed on the form to move them around.
sentences.chinese: 可以拖放已經放置在表單上的任何項目使其左右移動。

sentences.english: Such, your address column procrastinates put inside still have a few addresses.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，你的地址欄拖放下來裏面仍有一些地址。

definition: to drag/to tow/(computing) to drag (mouse operation)
a control (e.g. button, text box etc) (computing)
Save As ... (menu option in a software application)
